level.heading: Disposition of forfeitures.
level.text: Forfeitures in the District of Columbia Police Officers and Fire Fighters' Retirement Fund established by § 1-712 shall not be applied to increase the annuity of a person, but rather, shall be applied to pay administrative expenses, if and as directed by the District of Columbia Retirement Board, or used to reduce the District's contributions.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-314 added this section.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 2(g) of the Police and Firefighter's Retirement and Disability Omnibus Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-33, March 19, 2013, 60 DCR 4630, 20 DCSTAT 493).
